Given an array with exactly 5 strings `"a"`, `"b"` or `"c"` (`char`s in Java, `character`s in Fortran), check if the array contains three and two of the same values.

["a", "b", "c", "b", "c"] ==> false // 1x "a", 2x "b" and 2x "c"
["a", "a", "a", "a", "a"] ==> false // 5x "a"
